name: War of the Dark Moons
description:
This game was made in two days as part of of a Game Gen Lesson. 
The controls are as followed:
Player1:W-Go/A- Turn left/D- Turn right/F- To Shoot
Player2:Up-Go/left-Turn left/Right- Turn right/Z- To Shoot

The back of story of game is simple. Two ships fight over the fate of three moons laden with resources. who wins this battle the outcome is up to you.

The song in game is Battle Against a True Hero (Epic Metal Remix)(Remastered New Version) by Mazhar M.
Battle Against a True Hero (EPIC METAL REMIX) (REMASTERED NEW VERSION) - YouTube
